ENJOY THE TRIFECTA

THE TRIFECTA IS

EXPERIENCE FLAVOR PRICE

The Cheyenne Cigarillo Trifecta is a one-of-a-kind smoking experience. Get three times the flavor, three times the savory smoke, and three times the value with Cheyenne Cigarillos. Sit back, relax, and Enjoy the Trifecta!

  • Pineapple
  • Dark & Mellow
  • Sweet
  • White Grape

Pinapple

Indulge your senses with Pineapple Cheyenne Cigarillos. As soon as you open the re-sealable pouch, the tropical aromas will instantly make your taste buds salivate. The sweet flavor of Pineapple, accompanied with the rich blend of cigar tobacco, makes you feel like you are one step away from paradise. So sit back, relax, and enjoy the savory smoke of Cheyenne Cigarillos.

Dark & Yellow

Immerse your palate in Dark &amo; Mellow Cheyenne Cigarillos. The robust and smooth flavor is cradled in a delectable tobacco wrapper that delivers a rich and mature aroma when lit. Spark a one-of-a-kind smoking experience with Dark &amo; Mellow Cheyenne Cigarillos...it's something we like to call the Cheyenne Cigarillo Trifecta: Great Looks. Great Taste. Great Price!

Sweet

Seduce your taste buds with Sweet Cheyenne Cigarillos. Each stick is filled with a rich blend of cigar tobacco mixed with just the right amount of sweetness, and cradled in a delectable wrapper. The sweet fragrance delights your taste buds as soon as you open the re-sealable pouch. Get ready to Enjoy the Trifecta!

White Grape

Seduce your senses with White Grape Cheyenne Cigarillos. Each stick is loaded with decadent flavor. With the refreshing aroma, crisp taste, and a price that can't be beat, you get to Enjoy the Trifecta of Cheyenne Cigarillos. Unlock the flavor and enjoy the savory smoke!
